description: A 60-second lesson on The Supply Chain Crisis: When the World Jammed.

hook.text: In 2021, a Toyota dealer sold used cars for more than new ones. A container ship blocked the Suez Canal.

buildup.text: COVID shut factories worldwide. When demand roared back, supply couldn't keep up.
